 
SHM-RQM (M.He and R.Rapp, arXiv:2209.13419) prediction of: 
13 TeV pp collisions, ground state bottom-hadrons dsigma/dpTdy [mub/GeV]
at mid-y=0, with dsigma^bb-bar/dy=68.87*1.24=85.4 mub 
 
[scaled from the calculated/fitted value 68.87 mub at 2<y<2.5 by a factor of 1.24 
which is obtained from FONLL calculation. This is also consistent with
ALICE (arXiv: 2102.13601 via non-prompt D-meson measurement) pp 5.02 TeV 
dsigma^bb-bar/dy =34.5 +- 2.4 mub at mid y=0, scaled by a FONLL-factor 
2.37 to 13 TeV, 34.5*2.37=81.8 mub]

[Cascade0-=Cascade0 + Cascade-]
